segments.text: This kitchen is becoming quite a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is really making a huge mess now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is literally flowing everywhere, down the cabinets, onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the damage this water is causing to the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me cringe to think about the warped floorboards and ruined cabinetry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of standing in that cold, dirty puddle is quite off-putting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just keeps polishing her plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a disgusting waste of water, too, just pouring out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Honestly, I'd feel so annoyed if this were my kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the tidy garden outside just makes the mess inside more galling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine pigsty rapidly developing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish someone would just turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels so preventable, which adds to my irritation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of cleaning all that up is truly repulsive.
segments.speaker: PAR
